items.text: shovels a length ball down to long-on off the backfoot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: full on off, defended into the off side
items.postText: That'll be drinks. Bangladesh have tightened the screws. I'm off to loosen up for a bit. Vishal's your man.
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.preText: Thanks, Akshay. Afghanistan really need to get this run rate going so that they have something to defend. Maybe rotate the strike a bit more to begin with. Mashrafe continues
items.text: bit short of length on the stumps and Shahzad punches it down to long-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.preText: Round the wicket to the left-hander
items.text: angles it in and Shahidi defends it back with a straight bat
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: adds a bit more angle with his action, targets the stumps, and Shahidi defends it back again
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.preText: Tushar Srivasta: "Afghanistan are a great case study for emerging cricket nations. Bangladesh took much more time and Zimbabwe while grew rapidly, declined faster. Cheers to the Associates!"
items.text: almost a run-out, superb effort from Mashrafe! He dived to his left full length in his follow through, as soon as Shahidi punched the ball back. Shahzad was well out of the crease and Mashrafe quickly flicked the ball back to the non-striker's end but could not hit the stumps. Shahzad was miles outside
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.text: he charges down and flays this one over the covers in the gap
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, 2 runs

items.text: this man is changing his approach. Shahzad goes back and across and slams the ball from outside off to over midwicket in the deep and in the gap for four
items.postText: Eight from the over. Afghanistan need more of those
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

items.text: flighted on off stump, he leans forward and defends it back
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: goes for a big sweep with a big swing but the ball is well outside off and stays low too to miss the bat
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: goes wider to deliver the ball and he targets the stumps, blocked back to the bowler again
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: takes a step down this time to get closer to the pitch of the ball and helps it to long-on for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.preText: Bakhtiar: "Afghan's have almost recovered the loss they have made early in the innings. Now let see, what score they think is sufficient considering the quality spinners they have."
items.text: makes room for the flighted ball and almost goes for the big shot but ends up driving it down to long off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Mohammad Shahzad, 1 run

items.text: goes back and cuts to cover point, he wants a single and Shahzad finally responds
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.preText:
Here's Shakib for the first time

Suresh Guna: "With proper exposure, the assosciates can do wonders like what HK did the other day against India."
items.text: pitched up a little and it's helped down to long on with the spin
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, 1 run

items.preText: Round the wicket. Three fielders in the circle on off
items.text: brings it towards the stumps with the angle but Shahzad sees the short length and goes back to open up, and then slam it to the midwicket boundary. Those arms have got some strength
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, FOUR runs

items.text: and now he holes out to long-on, spectacular catch from debutant Abu Hider! Shahzad was showing his intent after the drinks break and now he charged down to loft that ball down the ground but could not get enough to send it all the way. Abu Hider was at long-on, he covered a fair distance to his left but was a few yards inside the boundary so he jumped at the last moment and held on to it with both hands. Since he was inside, he had enough ground behind him to tumble and then celebrate with his arms stretched, like Shahid Afridi
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Mohammad Shahzad, OUT

dismissal.text: Mohammad Shahzad c Abu Hider b Shakib Al Hasan 37 (47b 4x4 0x6) SR: 78.72

items.text: stays low on the stumps as the batsman defends it back
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: gets a hint of room and he cuts off the back foot to get off the mark
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: bit too full on off and he drives it square but can't clear the fielder
items.postText: Shakib delivers in his first over, just like Abu Hider did. What a match the debutant is having. He may have hurt himself and walked off the field after that catch
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run

items.text: bit of flight on off, he leans forward and tucks the ball to leg
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, no run
Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: leans forward and blocks the length ball with his head down
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, no run

items.text: lets the ball turn in towards him and nudges it to leg for one
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Asghar Afghan, 1 run

items.text: on length on off, tickled to midwicket off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hashmatullah Shahidi, no run
